alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 9:43PM PST until December 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional accumulation around 1 inch in the western Magic Valley with 1 to 3 inches in southern Twin Falls County and Malheur County. Wind gusts to 30 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow and reduced visibility. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Oregon and south central Idaho. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
